Row.Text: Enemy Units within two tiles of this city have -10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides free Walls in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_RES_INCENSE] Incense and [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine. Reduces [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Religious Unrest.
Sturdy Medieval Era unit that recovers quickly when beginning on pillaged Farms, Trading Posts, Towns, and Villages, and resists Ranged Attacks. Only Wallachia may build it.

The unique Lefegii is the Longswordsman replacement for Wallachia. Unlike the Longswordsman, this unit is very resilient to damage, especially from Ranged Attacks. It gains a 20% Defensive bonus against all Ranged Attacks and heals 5 damage each turn that it begins on a pillaged Farm, Trading Post, Town, or Village. Lefegii will likely sustain themselves well for long, drawn-out wars.
When beginning its turn on a pillaged Farm, Trading Post, Town, or Village, [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]HEALS[ENDCOLOR] an extra +5 damage.
Whilst beginning its turn on a pillaged Farm, Trading Post, Town, or Village, [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]HEALS[ENDCOLOR] an extra +5 damage.

Warfare is becoming more and more reliant on long range artillery and missiles. We must keep our national defense modern and effective by establishing a new military division to defend our nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be North Korea. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Rocketry. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2500 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for Rocket Artillery and Mobile SAMs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Range for Guided Missiles and Nuclear Missiles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 Cargo Limit for Nuclear Submarines and Missile Cruisers.

Warfare is becoming more and more reliant on long range artillery and missiles. We must keep our national defense modern and effective by establishing a new military division to defend our nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for Rocket Artillery and Mobile SAMs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Range for Guided Missiles and Nuclear Missiles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 Cargo Limit for Nuclear Submarines and Missile Cruisers.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has adopted firearms into their elite Lefegii unit.

Although our nation has become more isolated on the world stage, this will not prevent us from dominating it! We shall follow a new path, the path of Juche, to become autarkic and brace this new era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be North Korea. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be in at least the Industrial Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May not be using more than half of your [ICON_TURNS_REMAINING] Trade Routes internationally. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pick an Ideology if you have none, or gain 2 free Policies if you have one already. [ICON_BULLET]Adopting Policies will start 3 turn WLTKDs in all cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-1% Social Policy cost for each [ICON_TURNS_REMAINING] Trade Route not being used internationally.

Although our nation has become more isolated on the world stage, this will not prevent us from dominating it! We shall follow a new path, the path of Juche, to become autarkic and brace this new era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pick an Ideology if you have none, or gain 2 free Policies if you have one already. [ICON_BULLET]Adopting Policies will start 3 turn WLTKDs in all cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-1% Social Policy cost for each [ICON_TURNS_REMAINING] Trade Route not being used internationally.
Our people are now swearing their undying allegiance and building golden statues of their glorious leader. I... can't say I dislike this to be honest. Keep up the good work comrade!
